short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Capture web-page screenshots instantly with a single click. They're saved to your account at https://begenieus.com .

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this users can use take screenshots of the web-pages they visit with a single click. The screenshot goes to your account on https://begenieus.com
